alert.note: Alert for Stanton (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 5:28AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Stanton County through 545 AM CDT... At 528 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles west of Stanton, or 10 miles southeast of Norfolk, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Stanton County, including the following locations... The Highway 57 and 32 Junction and Lake Maskenthine Recreation Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
